decoworld.model.world.combat

Interface HasCombat

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HasHealth, HasStats, StatListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedMob, AmmoCrate, Arrow, CombatEntity, Crate, GenericMobSprite, HealthPack, Player, PlayerPet, Yralemounts, Zombiemounts

    public interface HasCombat
extends HasHealth
    Objects that have health and need to be damaged or healed should implement this interface.

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      void applyEffect(HealthEffect effect)
      Apply a health effect.

    • Method Detail

      • applyEffect

        void applyEffect(HealthEffect effect)
        Apply a health effect. Defense and healing bonuses are taken into account.
        Parameters:
        effect - - the HealthEffect object
